info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 10:11PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Daniels, Roosevelt and Sheridan Counties through 1115 PM MDT... At 1011 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Archer, or 14 miles west of Plentywood, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plentywood, Scobey, Medicine Lake, Froid, Westby, Flaxville, Archer, Port Of Raymond, Port Of Whitetail, Madoc, Bredette, Port Of Scobey, Redstone, Whitetail, Outlook, Reserve, Raymond, Four Buttes, Volt and Comertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
